price: If We willed, We could surely take away what We have revealed to you, then you would find no guardian to plead its return from Us;
arabic: وَلَئِن شِئۡنَا لَنَذۡهَبَنَّ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ بِهِۦ عَلَيۡنَا وَكِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
